item.funcation.trade_guide_book.desc: A book listing all available trades and their unlock requirements.
book.funcation.trade_guide.title: Trade Guide
book.funcation.trade_guide.author: Funcation Mod
book.funcation.trade_guide.intro:
All available trades by tier. Locked trades require progression.

Tier headers are shown in blue. Trades are shown in dark gray. Inputs can be in any order unless otherwise noted.
